content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1000 Euros per month. Can you tell me the rental price?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I'm sorry, I'm not able to disclose the rental price at this time. However, I can tell you that the apartment is 25 square meters and is located in a prime location in the city. It would be beneficial for you to consider the location and other factors when determining the rental price. Would you like to schedule a follow-up meeting to further discuss the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, please. How about next Monday at 2 pm?

Also, do you have any other questions for me?

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Juan Mamani
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your response, Juan. I agree to the rental price of 1000 Euros per month. You can sign the lease agreement on Monday at 2 pm. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Heinrich Heine
